FuncDef: The authentication-scheme command creates an authentication scheme and displays its view. The undo authentication-scheme command deletes an authentication scheme. By default, the authentication scheme named default exists on the device. It can be modified but cannot be deleted. ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an authentication scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces or the following symbols: / \ : * ? " < > | . The value cannot be - or --.

ExtraInfo: To authenticate users, run the authentication-scheme command to create an authentication scheme. Creating an authentication scheme is necessary before performing authentication-relevant configurations.
